system.description:
Expend a charge from this system for one of the following effects:

  • Frag Grenade (Grenade, RANGE 5, BLAST 1): All characters within the affected area must pass an AGILITY save or take 1d6 EXPLOSIVE damage. On a success, they take half damage.
  • Explosive Mine (Mine, BURST 1): All characters within the affected area must pass an AGILITY save or take 2d6 EXPLOSIVE damage. On a success, they take half damage.
